Choosing a major

Uncover your path to success by selecting a major that aligns with your passion and ambitions. Choose a major that fuels your aspirations and sets the stage for a rewarding and fulfilling academic journey ahead.

UG educates more than 38,000students annually, with approximately 2.64% being computer science students.

Undergraduate Courses


"Embark on an exciting academic adventure with our undergraduate courses. Dive into a diverse curriculum designed to cultivate foundational knowledge while nurturing critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Explore your passions, discover new interests, and lay the groundwork for a successful and fulfilling career journey."

Graduate Courses( Mphil Computer Science)


Elevate your expertise in Computer Science through our distinguished MPhil program. Delve into advanced coursework and cutting-edge research, guided by world-class faculty. Immerse yourself in a collaborative environment that fosters innovation, equipping you with the skills and insights to thrive in a rapidly evolving technological landscape."

Graduate Courses( PhD Computer Science)


"Elevate your understanding of Computer Science through our MSc program. Gain specialized skills, leverage state-of-the-art technologies, and solve real-world challenges. Experience a dynamic learning environment, collaborate with industry professionals, and emerge as a sought-after expert in the ever-evolving tech landscape."

Graduate Courses(PHD)


"Unleash your potential with our PhD program, where curiosity meets innovation. Dive into rigorous research, push the boundaries of knowledge, and make meaningful contributions to your field. Join a vibrant community of scholars, pursue your intellectual passions, and become a thought leader driving impactful change."
